Coso1.pregunta: How do I change my password?
Coso1.respuesta: You can change your password in the account settings section.

Coso2.pregunta: How do I change my email?
Coso2.respuesta: You can change your email in the account settings section.

Coso3.pregunta: How do I change my username?
Coso3.respuesta: You can change your username in the account settings section.

Coso4.pregunta: How do I change my profile picture?
Coso4.respuesta: You can change your profile picture in the account settings section.

Coso5.pregunta: How do I set night mode?
Coso5.respuesta: You can set night mode in the configuration section.

Coso6.pregunta: How do I change the language?
Coso6.respuesta: You can change the language in the configuration section.
